name: Fish Ya Later
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Fish Ya Later is a casual arcade game where you aim to get the highest score possible by dodging fish hooks and eating fish food. For PC, control the fish using your mouse by clicking and holding the left mouse button wherever you want the fish to swim to. The game was designed to be used as the game project to make for a Unity Mobile workshop we held way back. The end product was then refactored and built for Windows, Linux, and WebGL.

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMING: https://applejacks.itch.io/

SPRITE ART: https://cheeeeesecake.itch.io/

MUSIC: 'Aurora' by Cal McEachern

SFX: Retrieved from opengameart.org

NOTE:

Game was intended to be played on android devices. Non-android builds of the game do not include the ff:

  • Multiple Control Schemes:
    • Tap: Tap or hold the direction you want the fish to go.
    • Swipe: Swipe in the direction you want the fish to go.
    • Tilt: Tilt your phone in the direction you want the fish to go. (Uses accelerometer).
